mapper.select: INSERT INTO app_order_archive ( `bid`, `sale_no`, `bname`, `airport_id`, `airportname`, `pid`, `province`, `sex`, `photo`, `order_num`, `order_num_back`, `file_time`, `year`, `month`, `day`, `dayweek` ) SELECT su.id, ao.sale_no, su.`name`, ao.airport_id, sa.airport_name, sc.CID, sc.`name`, su.sex, su.photo, COUNT(ao.order_id) AS total_nums, acc.back_order_num, #{maxTime}, DATE_FORMAT(#{maxTime},'%Y') AS YEAR, DATE_FORMAT(#{maxTime},'%m') AS MONTH, DATE_FORMAT(#{maxTime},'%d') AS DAY, WEEKDAY(#{maxTime})+1 FROM app_orders ao INNER JOIN sys_users su ON ao.sale_no = su.`code` INNER JOIN sys_airport sa ON sa.airport_id = ao.airport_id LEFT JOIN sys_city sc ON sc.CID = sa.province LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ao.sale_no, ao.airport_id AS airport_id, count(card.back_id) AS back_order_num FROM `app_card_back` card INNER JOIN `app_orders` ao ON card.order_id = ao.order_id WHERE DATE_FORMAT(card.finish_time,'%Y-%m-%d') =#{maxTime} GROUP BY ao.sale_no, ao.airport_id ) acc on acc.sale_no=ao.sale_no and acc.airport_id=ao.airport_id WHERE DATE_FORMAT(ao.order_time,'%Y-%m-%d') =#{maxTime} AND ao.pay_time IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ao.sale_no, ao.airport_id

SELECT concat(#{currentTime},'$',pid) as cacheKey, count(DISTINCT aoa.bid) AS pcount, sum(aoa.order_num) AS total, sum(aoa.order_num) / count(DISTINCT aoa.bid) AS avgNum, aoa.pid, CASE WHEN sum(aoa.order_num_back) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE sum(aoa.order_num_back) END AS back_order_total, sum(aoa.order_num_back) / count(DISTINCT aoa.bid) as avgNum_back FROM app_order_archive aoa where DATE_FORMAT(aoa.file_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{currentTime} GROUP BY aoa.pid

select concat(#{currentTime},"$",aoa.pid,'$',aoa.airport_id) as cacheKey, sum(aoa.order_num) AS total, CASE WHEN sum(aoa.order_num_back) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE sum(aoa.order_num_back) END AS back_order_total, B.pcount, CASE WHEN sum(aoa.order_num) / pcount IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE sum(aoa.order_num) / pcount END AS avgNum, CASE WHEN sum(aoa.order_num_back) / pcount IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE sum(aoa.order_num) / pcount END AS avgNum_back from app_order_archive aoa LEFT JOIN ( SELECT sua.airport_id, count(su.id) AS pcount FROM sys_users su INNER JOIN sys_user_airport sua ON su.id = sua.sys_id WHERE su.user_type = 3 GROUP BY sua.airport_id ) B ON aoa.airport_id = B.airport_id where DATE_FORMAT(aoa.file_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{currentTime} group by aoa.pid,aoa.airport_id
